PrecisApproval of Rules Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL RULES which are designed to streamline the Tribunal's procedures, expedite the hearing of matters, reflect international trade commitments and generally provide comprehensive and transparent guidance to parties appearing before the Tribunal, effective April 15, 2000.
